title: >>> LEGEND vs. LEGEND 2
body_text:
Let's review for a second.
I.
Steve Adams's promising a huge surprise at DODGEBALL 75, one to shake the very foundations of dodgeball itself.
II.
The TOM FUND opening up to the Wall High School warriors in an effort to give a little something back to popular pizzaman Luke.
So what's left you ask? Perhaps only the biggest, and certainly unpredictable match in the history of the game:
This is what dodgeball is all about: competition.
When you have captains the caliber of Chris Adams and Kevin Fitzpatrick, there is no remorse. Both iron men will fight tooth and nail, sacrificing their bodies all in an effort to claim victory.
The finale event of 2006 included the long awaited captains showdown between the two legends. Few however would have foreseen the end result as "Fitz" absolutely dominated the eldest Adams brother, both in the team game and in one-on-one eliminations. Since DODGEBALL 70, Chris has patiently and anxiously awaited "Round 2".
Well, the wait is over and come February 10, at the 75th dodgeball spectacular, both men get the opportunity to prove their dominance.
Only one however will have their arms raised in victory.
THE TWIST
It's a concept never done before. In their heated rematch, both men will
not
choose allies to form their respective armies. Rather, they select players as their enemies. It's
Pick Your Poison
captains warfare!
-->
Can Chris tie-up the series? Or will "Fitz" continue to climb the ladder of success?
If their first, and to date only confrontation is any indication, their rematch will undoubtedly become one of the all-time great stories of the 2007 year.
**Official
Adams vs. Fitz 2
Poster:
http://good-times.webshots.com/photo/2233518380090300279kPnViV
body_html:
Let's review for a second.

I. Steve Adams's promising a huge surprise at DODGEBALL 75, one to shake the very foundations of dodgeball itself.
II. The TOM FUND opening up to the Wall High School warriors in an effort to give a little something back to popular pizzaman Luke.

So what's left you ask? Perhaps only the biggest, and certainly unpredictable match in the history of the game:


This is what dodgeball is all about: competition.

When you have captains the caliber of Chris Adams and Kevin Fitzpatrick, there is no remorse. Both iron men will fight tooth and nail, sacrificing their bodies all in an effort to claim victory.

The finale event of 2006 included the long awaited captains showdown between the two legends. Few however would have foreseen the end result as "Fitz" absolutely dominated the eldest Adams brother, both in the team game and in one-on-one eliminations. Since DODGEBALL 70, Chris has patiently and anxiously awaited "Round 2".

Well, the wait is over and come February 10, at the 75th dodgeball spectacular, both men get the opportunity to prove their dominance.
Only one however will have their arms raised in victory.

THE TWIST
It's a concept never done before. In their heated rematch, both men will not choose allies to form their respective armies. Rather, they select players as their enemies. It's Pick Your Poison captains warfare!

--> Can Chris tie-up the series? Or will "Fitz" continue to climb the ladder of success?

If their first, and to date only confrontation is any indication, their rematch will undoubtedly become one of the all-time great stories of the 2007 year.


**Official Adams vs. Fitz 2 Poster: http://good-times.webshots.com/photo/2233518380090300279kPnViV
